name: get_project_type

projectType.description: The enum representing the project type, where each number corresponds to a specific type: 1 for Frontend, 2 for Frontend+PHP, 3 for Frontend+Java, 4 for Frontend+Python, 5 for Frontend+Go, 6 for Backend, 7 for Server-side, 8 for AI, and 9 for Others.

appropriate.description: Whether the project type is appropriate for the member's skills

description: Get the project type for a specific development project
